summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Lander Street, from 14th Avenue South to 21st Avenue South; Beacon Avenue, from 14th Avenue South to Hanford Street; McClellan Street from 13th Avenue South to 17th Avenue South; Forest Street and Winthrop Street, each from 14th Avenue South to 17th Avenue South; Stevens Street and Hanford Street, each form 14th Avenue South to Beacon Avenue; 14th Avenue South from Lander Street to Hanford Street; and 15th Avenue South and 16th Avenue South, each from Beacon Avenue to Hanford Street; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 361 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
